name: The Person You Love... - Preorder
description:
The person you love is 72.8% water. 

 - This is a preorder exclusive via jordanfish.com. Do not tell your friends unless you've ordered yours already because once they are gone, I can't say I know if they will ever be made again! Please read the "About" link on the right before ordering. -

You can order from anywhere, shipping is worldwide! 

The price may be in British Â£ but our clever store will change to your currency while you are checking out!


Sizing:

XSmall - 30/32
Small - 34/36 
Medium - 38/40 
Large - 42/44 
XLarge - 46/48
** If you need a smaller/larger size email me via the contact page to the right and I can try and hook you up with a custom order because I am really nice!
